column2: §M(ED:MP)§! Human players' subjugations of §Ydukes, kings and emperors§! require specific host permission
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' subjugations of §Ykings and emperors§! require specific host permission
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' subjugations of §Yemperors§! require specific host permission
§M(ED:MP)§! Subjugations are enabled for human players against all targets
§M(ED:MP)§! Subjugations are NOT enabled for human players against all targets
§M(ED:MP)§! §R!!! LOGIC ERROR !!! Subjugation rule setup is internally inconsistent§!
§M(ED:MP)§! Subjugation rule setup is NOT internally inconsistent
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' subjugations will be §Genabled§! against all targets
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' subjugations of §Ydukes, kings and emperors§! will be §Rdisabled§!, unless they have specific host permission
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' subjugations of §Ykings and emperors§! will be §Rdisabled§!, unless they have specific host permission
§M(ED:MP)§! Human players' subjugations of §Yemperors§! will be §Rdisabled§!, unless they have specific host permission
